ai-iti15:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti15:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I do not see a single fetter, fettered by which people wander and transmigrate for a long time like the fetter of craving.
ai-iti15:2.2_0: Fettered by craving, people wander and transmigrate for a long time.”
ai-iti15:2.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti15:3.2_0: as they transmigrate on this long journey.
ai-iti15:3.3_0: They go from this state to another,
ai-iti15:4.2_0: that craving is the cause of suffering—
ai-iti15:4.3_0: Rid of craving, free of grasping,
ai-iti15:4.4_0: to give up desire for rebirth.
ai-iti15:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
